metadata.title: CVE-2021-39936 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Improper access control in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 10.7 before 14.3.6, all versions starting from 14.4 before 14.4.4, allversions starting from 14.5 before 14.5.2, allows an attacker in possessionof a deploy token to access a project's disabled wiki.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
